name: backend
description: Backend API with PostgreSQL and Prisma

scripts.db:migrate: node -e "const os=require('os'); const cmd=os.platform()==='win32'?'.\\node_modules\\.bin\\prisma.cmd migrate dev --name migration':'npx prisma migrate dev --name migration'; require('child_process').execSync(cmd, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.db:generate: node -e "const os=require('os'); const cmd=os.platform()==='win32'?'.\\node_modules\\.bin\\prisma.cmd generate':'npx prisma generate'; require('child_process').execSync(cmd, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.db:studio: node -e "const os=require('os'); const cmd=os.platform()==='win32'?'.\\node_modules\\.bin\\prisma.cmd studio':'npx prisma studio'; require('child_process').execSync(cmd, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.db:reset: node -e "const os=require('os'); const cmd=os.platform()==='win32'?'.\\node_modules\\.bin\\prisma.cmd migrate reset --force':'npx prisma migrate reset --force'; require('child_process').execSync(cmd, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
